actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which increased the current year liability test for estimated tax payments from 80 to 90 percent.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that increase from 80 percent to 90 percent the current year liability test for estimated tax payments by individuals.

titles.title: To repeal the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which increased the current year liability test for estimated tax payments from 80 to 90 percent.
